channel.title: Comments on: Loose Ends
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: Sorry to hear that the game ended... and that I was one of the guys who bailed on you. My brief time with Frayed was fun and wildly imaginative with some genuinely scary moments. A year and a half is about three lifetimes in the PBEM world -- definitely something to be proud of.
item.content:encoded: Sorry to hear that the game ended… and that I was one of the guys who bailed on you. My brief time with Frayed was fun and wildly imaginative with some genuinely scary moments. A year and a half is about three lifetimes in the PBEM world — definitely something to be proud of.
